metadata.name: Suspicious Teams Application Related ObjectAcess Event
metadata.comment: Detects an access to authentication tokens and accounts of Microsoft Teams desktop application.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 4663 AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\cookies')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\local storage\\leveldb'))) AND NOT contains(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\microsoft\\teams\\current\\teams.exe')))

output.summary: Detects an access to authentication tokens and accounts of Microsoft Teams desktop application.
